spec_data.Name: perl-Gtk2-Ex-Carp
spec_data.Description:
This module exports four functions, of which two override the standard
die() and warn() functions, and two which allow for extended error
reporting. When called, these functions display a user-friendly message
dialog window.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:08:22 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: GTK+ friendly die() and warn() functions
